creditline: The Ted and Roberta Mann Foundation Endowment Fund
description: landscape scenes with gold sky and gold ground between scenes; rolling mountains; villages by bodies of water and rivers with small groves of trees; some tiny figures inside buildings, on boats and in landscapes; place names in black on small gold rectangles
medium: Ink, colors and gold on paper
object_name: Six-panel folding screen, one of a pair (left)
title: Tokaido Road, one of a pair
